name: Rotsam Swarm
description: The Rotsam Swarm is a large ooze creature characterized by its unaligned nature and affinity for necrotic energy, featuring a foul odor and a rotting appearance.
memorable: Its lethal diseased bites can spread a debilitating infection that affects its targets' health.
goals: To spread decay and infect living creatures with its disease.
relations: May be found in the company of other oozes or in decaying environments.
environment: Thrives in areas where decay is prevalent, such as swamps or other necrotic-infested locations.
strengths: Significant hit points and resistance to multiple damage types; capable of inflicting diseases.
weaknesses: Low Armor Class and poor Dexterity makes it vulnerable to attacks.
attacks: Diseased Bites that inflict both piercing and necrotic damage, with a chance to contract bog rot disease.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to spread bog rot disease, severely reducing affected creatures' health.
senses: Blindsight out to 60 feet; can detect threats within this range.
additional_information: Immune to necrotic damage and several conditions
Can climb difficult surfaces like ceilings without checks
Swarm ability allows it to occupy the same space as other creatures
Infected creatures smell of rot, making them easier to locate
Damage dealt decreases when the swarm is at half hit points or lower
test_queries: large decaying ooze that spreads disease
